job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: puSite Reliability Engineer SREuppPalo Alto CA United StatesppbrppbrppstronguAbout Yo LabsustrongppTechnology has changed daily life in a way no one could have imaginednbspIts made us more productive capable and connectednbspBut it has come at a costnbspWere productive but overwhelmednbspCapable but paralyzed by too many choicesnbspConnected but only if social media countsnbspLiving this way creates a void in our daily livesnbspYo Labs is here to change thatnbspOur team is committed to alleviating the mental load that our modern world has created by putting human connection back into technology and caretaking at the heart of everything we createppbrppAs part of a growing team you will work on various aspects of the tooling and infrastructure including security and identity kubernetes clusters CICD systems services federation mesh technologiesnbspppbrppstronguJob DutiesustrongpulliDesign and build tooling automation and services that enable productivity across the entire organizationnbspliliImprove security posture of the organization by way of tooling policy example code and publishing best practicesnbspliliDesign and automate lifecycle for cloud resources including EKSKubernetes VMs IoT Core IAM usersroles etcnbspliliDesign and implement observability solution enabling developers self service debugging and alerting capabilitiesnbspliliDive and support our IDP and SSO solution from corp network into cloudproduction systemsnbspliliHelp to manage CICD systems tooling and general automationnbspliliDefine build and evangelize best practices for a kubernetes based architecturenbspnbspliulpbrppstronguQualificationsustrongpulliBABS degree or equivalent experiencelili10 or more years of system and site reliability engineering experienceliliKnowledge of the primary AWS services EC2 ELB RDS Route53 amp S3liliKnowledge of IDPs such as Googles GSuite and OktaliliFirst hand experience kubernetes running in AWSliliExperience deploying microservices using an envoy based meshliliLeading highlyavailable and faulttolerant enterprise and webscale software deploymentsliliInfrastructure automation through code and general scripting Eg go bash pythonliliConfiguration management using TerraformliliStrong practical Linux systems administration skills in a cloud and containerized environmentliliExperience managing cloud operations including data assurance monitoring alerting and notificationsliliDemonstrated ability to think strategically about business product and technical challengesliliExperience leading
